scripts.build-python: node -e "const {execSync} = require('child_process'); const os = require('os'); const path = require('path'); const scriptDir = path.join(__dirname, 'python-scripts'); if (os.platform() === 'win32') { execSync('powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File build-python.ps1', {cwd: scriptDir, stdio: 'inherit'}); } else { execSync('bash build-python.sh', {cwd: scriptDir, stdio: 'inherit'}); }"
scripts.build-python-mac: node -e "const {execSync} = require('child_process'); const path = require('path'); const scriptDir = path.join(__dirname, 'python-scripts'); execSync('bash build-python.sh arm64 x64', {cwd: scriptDir, stdio: 'inherit'});"
scripts.verify-python: node -e "const {execSync} = require('child_process'); const os = require('os'); const path = require('path'); const scriptDir = path.join(__dirname, 'python-scripts'); const platform = os.platform() === 'win32' ? 'Windows' : os.platform() === 'darwin' ? 'Darwin' : 'Linux'; const archs = os.platform() === 'darwin' ? 'arm64 x64' : ''; execSync('bash verify-build.sh ' + platform + ' \'' + archs + '\'', {cwd: scriptDir, stdio: 'inherit'});"
scripts.build-all: npm run build-python && npm run build
scripts.build-all-mac: npm run build-python-mac && npm run build
scripts.start: npm run build-python && npm run build && npm run electron
scripts.start:dev: npm run build && npm run electron
scripts.package-win: npm run build-all && npm run verify-python && electron-builder -w appx:x64 && electron-builder -w appx:ia32 && electron-builder -w appx:arm64
scripts.package-win-ci: npm run build-all && npm run verify-python && electron-builder -w --x64 -p never && electron-builder -w --ia32 -p never
scripts.package-win-nsis: npm run build-all && npm run verify-python && electron-builder -w --x64 -p never
scripts.package-mac: npm run build-all-mac && npm run verify-python && electron-builder --mac --x64 && electron-builder --mac --arm64
scripts.package-mas: npm run build-all-mac && npm run verify-python && bash build/resignAndPackage.sh
scripts.package-linux: npm run build-all && npm run verify-python && electron-builder --linux --x64 -p never
